subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: After 60 minutes of regulation play, 5 more of four-on-four overtime and 96 shots, it ended with the Devils scoring the only goal in the shootout for a 1-0 win.
snippet: After 60 minutes of regulation play, 5 more of four-on-four overtime and 96 shots, it ended with the Devils scoring the only goal in the shootout for a 1-0 win.
